Dear Chloe

Q: Dear Chloe,

My friends and I are having a disagreement about fashion trends. How do I handle this?

A: Dear Fashionista,

It's perfectly normal to have different opinions about fashion trends. The key is to respect each other's choices and find a middle ground. Remember, fashion is all about expressing yourself!

Q: Hey Chloe,

I'm feeling stressed with schoolwork and extracurricular activities. Any advice on managing my time better?

A: Hi Busy Bee,

Time management is crucial! Create a schedule, prioritize tasks, and don't forget to take breaks to recharge. You've got this!
